longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of the intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of ID Cards issued by the Ministry of Foreign
  Affairs to foreign mission personnel. 

Visa required, except for Former nationals of Cape Verde
including their spouses and children. 
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Nationals of Jordan can obtain a
visa on arrival. Fee: EUR 25.-
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever is required if arriving
within 6 days after leaving or transiting countries with risk
of yellow fever transmission For details, click here. 

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission if not leaving the transit areas. 
Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk is limited, mainly due to
  P. falciparum, from August to November inclusive in Santiago
  Isl. and in Boavista Isl. Recommended prevention in risk
  areas: A.
